overview: Filmed live in Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia, this is the first stand-up special from internationally acclaimed comedian Brian Aylward. Brian is also a former Canadian Comedy Award winner for "Best Stand-up Comic."A Newfoundland native, Brian shares a huge sack of hilarious stories from his adventures throughout Asia. It's all original, brilliantly observational comedy that bridges the cultural gap.
title: Brian Aylward: Big in Asia
